```{r}
# label: load packages and data

pacman::p_load("dplyr", "here", "pins", "typstcv")
resume_type <- "default"
board <- board_s3(bucket = Sys.getenv("S3_BUCKET"),
                  versioned = TRUE,
                  cache = here("cache"),
                  region = Sys.getenv("S3_REGION"),
                  endpoint = Sys.getenv("S3_ENDPOINT"),
                  access_key = Sys.getenv("S3_PUB_KEY"),
                  secret_access_key = Sys.getenv("S3_PRIV_KEY"))

resume_df <- pin_read(board, name = "resume_data")
```
